SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

org.garret.perst
Annotation Type Indexable

@Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Indexable

Annotation for marking indexable fields used by Database class to create table descriptors. Indices can be unique or allow duplicates. If index is marked as unique and during transaction commit it is find out that there is already some other object with this key, NotUniqueException will be thrown Case insensitive attribute is meaningful only for string keys and if set cause ignoring case of key values. Thick index should be used for keys with small set of unique values.

Optional Element Summary
 boolean caseInsensitive
          String index is case insensitive
 boolean randomAccess
          Index supports fast access to elements by position
 boolean thick
          Index is optimized to handle large number of duplicate key values
 boolean unique
          Index may not contain dupicates
 

caseInsensitive

public abstract boolean caseInsensitive
String index is case insensitive

Default:
false

randomAccess

public abstract boolean randomAccess
Index supports fast access to elements by position

Default:
false

thick

public abstract boolean thick
Index is optimized to handle large number of duplicate key values

Default:
false

unique

public abstract boolean unique
Index may not contain dupicates

Default:
false
